#summary How to install WeatherPaper on your system

= Platform =

== Windows ==

Windows XP and Vista are supported. Download and run the installer.

== Linux ==

At the moment, only GNOME is supported. This is because KDE 4.0 removed the system call that changed and refreshed the desktop background. I have not yet figured out what the new system call is.

At the moment things are still a bit manual. I am looking into creating a .deb installer.
